item.title: 据当地警长办公室称，一名 11 岁男孩因涉嫌携带上膛枪支到学校杀害另一名学生而被捕并受到指控。
item.description: An 11-year-old boy has been arrested and charged after he allegedly brought a loaded gun to school seeking to kill another student, according to the local sheriff’s office. trib.al/3XGBp55

item.title: 就在哈里王子惊喜地前往英国看望他的父亲查尔斯国王几天之后，他又惊喜地出现在了拉斯维加斯。
item.description: Just days after making a surprise trip to the U.K. to see his father, King Charles, Prince Harry made another surprise appearance — this time in Las Vegas. trib.al/ZDI5Fo6

item.title: R to @ABC：@ABC2020 将在美国东部时间 2 月 9 日星期五晚 9 点播出的一集中探讨此案，其中包括对调查谋杀案并将责任人绳之以法的人员的独家采访。
item.description:
@ABC2020 will explore the case in an episode airing Friday, Feb. 9, at 9 p.m. ET, featuring exclusive interviews with the people who investigated the murders and brought those responsible to justice.

abcnews.go.com/US/nashville-…

item.title: R转@ABC：历时三年的谋杀案调查后来揭开了一系列秘密，其中包括一段不正当的婚外情、全美范围内的贿赂以及一个雇凶杀人的阴谋。
item.description: The three-year investigation into their murders would later uncover a whole host of secrets, including an illicit affair, payoffs across the U.S. and a murder-for-hire plot.

item.title: 据调查人员称，2020 年 3 月 13 日，在一辆撞到树上的白色讴歌车中发现了身中数枪的霍利-威廉姆斯和比尔-兰韦的尸体。
item.description:
On March 13, 2020, the bodies of Holly Williams and Bill Lanway, who were shot several times, were discovered in a white Acura that had hit a tree, according to investigators.

abcnews.go.com/US/nashville-…

item.title: 海军陆战队表示，本周在一次例行训练飞行中因直升机坠毁而丧生的五名海军陆战队员的身份已经确认。
item.description: The five Marines who died when their helicopter crashed during a routine training flight this week have been identified, the Marine Corps said. trib.al/FfkQg1n

item.title:
安克雷奇正在审理一起杀害两名阿拉斯加土著妇女的双重谋杀案。
以下是关于这起震惊全城的案件的相关信息：
item.description:
A double murder trial is underway in Anchorage for the killing of two Alaska Native women.

Here's what to know about the case that's gripping the city: trib.al/8ZZE3e0

item.title: 一名前 TikTok 高管对该社交媒体平台提起诉讼，称自己遭到报复并被解雇，因为该公司在中国的所有者认为她 "缺乏女性员工应有的温顺和柔顺"。
item.description: A former TikTok executive has filed a lawsuit against the social media platform, alleging she was retaliated against and fired because the company’s owners in China determined she "lacked the docility and meekness" required of female employees. trib.al/wlgfuU3

item.title: 芝加哥一家标志性餐厅因其著名的早餐而闻名，里面摆满了数十年的纪念品。
item.description: An overnight fire caused extensive damage to an iconic Chicago restaurant that's known for its famous breakfasts and is filled with decades of memorabilia, authorities said. trib.al/U6MV1NW

item.title: 在马萨诸塞州失踪大学生莫拉-穆雷（Maura Murray）神秘失踪 20 周年之际，警方公布了她的最新年龄照片，希望能从中找到新的线索。
item.description: A new age progression photo has been released of missing Massachusetts college student Maura Murray in an effort to prompt new leads on the 20th anniversary of her mysterious disappearance. trib.al/wfst8qq

item.title: 据纽约市警方称，一名枪手在时代广场开枪打伤一名游客，并向一名接警警察开枪，目前警方正在搜捕这名枪手。
item.description: A manhunt is underway for a gunman who shot and injured a tourist in Times Square and fired at a responding officer, according to New York City police. trib.al/7vE6DFZ

item.title: 根据 @ABC 新闻对政府数据的分析和对专家的采访，近年来汽车召回数量激增，主要原因是汽车的复杂性增加，其中充斥的电子元件增加了发生故障的可能性。
item.description: Car recalls have surged in recent years, owing largely to the increased complexity of vehicles replete with electronic components that increase the likelihood of a malfunction, according to @ABC News analysis of government data and interviews with experts. trib.al/skjZ14J

item.title: 洛杉矶湖人队（Los Angeles Lakers）为科比-布莱恩特（Kobe Bryant）的新雕像揭幕，这座重达 4000 磅的青铜雕像位于湖人队市中心球馆外，以纪念这位已故的超级巨星。
item.description: The Los Angeles Lakers have unveiled a new statue of Kobe Bryant, honoring the late superstar with a 4,000-pound bronze likeness outside their downtown arena. trib.al/KGiSDcZ

item.title: 小肯尼迪（RFK Jr.）为争取以独立候选人身份参加选举，与自由党进行了接触。
item.description: RFK Jr., on march to get on the ballot as an independent, flirts with Libertarian Party. trib.al/6sGb0eu

item.title:
在一个日益分裂和两极分化的媒体环境中，随着观看电视直播的人越来越少，超级碗成为了一种反常现象。
事实上，超级碗比赛的收视率一直在上升，去年的收视人数达到了创纪录的 1.151 亿。
item.description:
In an increasingly fractured and polarized media environment — and with fewer people watching live TV — the Super Bowl is an anomaly.

The big game's viewership has actually increased, with a record 115.1 million people tuning in last year. trib.al/5zxNrlM

item.title:
2023 年 11 月初，乌克兰项目发起了在线倡议 "玩具圈"。
在大约三个月的时间里，"玩具圈 "已经将一千多名儿童及其家庭与来自世界各地的玩具捐赠者联系起来。
更多
item.description:
In early November 2023, Project Ukraine launched an online initiative The Circle of Toys.

In about three months, Circle of Toys has already connected more than a thousand children and their families with donors sending toys from around the world.

More: trib.al/4N743Sq

item.title: 周六夜现场》（Saturday Night Live）节目 "周末更新"（Weekend Update）的联合主播科林-约斯特（Colin Jost）将有机会在白宫记者协会（White House Correspondents' Association）的年度晚宴上作为特邀艺人烤炙主要的政治和媒体人物。
item.description: Colin Jost, the co-anchor of Saturday Night Live’s "Weekend Update," will get a chance to roast leading political and media figures as the featured entertainer at the annual dinner of the White House Correspondents’ Association. trib.al/k4xIxQ1

item.title: 最新消息：以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡的办公室称，内塔尼亚胡已要求以色列国防军制定一项 "双重计划"，在 "解散 "据称位于加沙地带南部拉法的哈马斯部队之前，先疏散那里的平民。
item.description: JUST IN: Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu has asked the IDF to come up with a "dual plan" to evacuate the civilian population in Rafah in the southern Gaza Strip before "disbanding" Hamas battalions allegedly located there, according to his office. trib.al/UIrUwbu

item.title: 就在哈里王子惊喜地前往英国看望他的父亲查尔斯国王几天之后，他又惊喜地出现在了拉斯维加斯。
item.description: Just days after making a surprise trip to the U.K. to see his father, King Charles, Prince Harry made another surprise appearance — this time in Las Vegas. trib.al/PCvRhi2

item.title: 三位多年的老友--他们说自己是最后一批可以加入 "从未错过超级碗 "俱乐部的球迷--今年将再次回到这里，参加第 58 届比赛。
item.description: Three longtime friends — who say they are the final fans who can claim membership in the exclusive "never missed a Super Bowl" club — are back again for number 58 this year. trib.al/QG6eWdI

item.title:
拜登总统在特别顾问就拜登卸任期间处理机密文件的情况提出报告后，于周四晚发表了讲话。
他对罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）声称总统不记得他的儿子博-拜登（Beau Biden）何时去世提出异议。
item.description:
Pres. Biden made remarks Thursday night following the special counsel’s report on Biden’s handling of classified documents while out of office.

He took issue with Robert Hur’s claim that the president could not remember when his son, Beau Biden, had died. trib.al/GrlfYZS

item.title: 早在 OceanGate 潜水器在前往泰坦尼克号残骸的途中不幸发生内爆之前，一名前雇员就曾警告公司高管，他们的船体设计和公司的测试方法效率低下。
item.description: Years before an OceanGate submersible tragically imploded on its way to the wreckage of the Titanic, a former employee warned company executives about the inefficiency of their hull design and the company's testing methods. trib.al/yTGZQZe

item.title:
曼哈顿检察官周四宣布，目前已有七人因涉嫌袭击两名纽约市警察而被起诉。
袭击事件发生在 1 月 27 日时代广场附近，当时警察正试图拘留一个人。
item.description:
Seven people have now been indicted in connection with the assault on two New York City police officers, the Manhattan DA announced Thursday.

The assault occurred Jan. 27 near Times Square as officers were trying to take a person into custody.
trib.al/L9YJ3Q2

item.title: 当被问及是否要为 "粗心处理机密材料 "负责时，拜登总统说："我为没有看清我的工作人员在做什么负责"。
item.description: Asked if he takes responsibility for being "careless with classified material," Pres. Biden says: "I take responsibility for not having seen exactly what my staff was doing." abcn.ws/4btHp8x

item.title: 拜登总统谈特别顾问报告"甚至有人说我不记得我儿子是什么时候死的。他怎么敢提这个问题！坦率地说，当我被问到这个问题时，我心想'这不关他们的事'"。
item.description: Pres. Biden on special counsel report: “There’s even reference that I don’t remember when my son died. How in the hell dare he raise that! Frankly, when I was asked the question, I thought to myself, ‘It wasn’t any of their damn business.’” abcn.ws/4btHp8x

item.title:
从第 98 届奥斯卡金像奖开始，选角导演终于可以得到应有的待遇了。
美国电影艺术与科学学院理事会宣布在奥斯卡奖中增设一个新的奖项，以表彰在选角方面取得的成就。
item.description:
Casting directors will finally get their due beginning with the 98th Academy Awards.

The Board of Governors of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced the addition of a new Oscars category for achievement in casting. trib.al/JZyE6eM

item.title: 演员马克-鲁法洛（Mark Ruffalo）因在漫威电影宇宙中饰演布鲁斯-班纳博士（又名绿巨人）而闻名，他还在《狐狸猎手》（Foxcatcher）、《聚焦》（Spotlight）和最近的《可怜的事》（Poor Things）中饰演了奥斯卡提名角色，现在他已经在好莱坞星光大道上拥有了一颗星。
item.description: Actor Mark Ruffalo, known for his role as Dr. Bruce Banner, aka the Hulk, in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, as well as Oscar-nominated roles in "Foxcatcher," "Spotlight" and the recent "Poor Things," now has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. trib.al/BwQTEld

item.title:
新消息：湖人队为纪念科比-布莱恩特的新雕像揭幕，该雕像将在洛杉矶体育馆外展出。
瓦妮莎-布莱恩特在雕像揭幕前发表了讲话。
item.description:
NEW: The Lakers have unveiled a new statue honoring Kobe Bryant that will be on display outside Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles.

Vanessa Bryant spoke before the statue was unveiled. abcn.ws/3OxZqtm

item.title: 最新消息：根据维尔京群岛共和党的结果，唐纳德-特朗普将赢得美属维尔京群岛共和党党团会议。
item.description: BREAKING: Donald Trump will win the U.S. Virgin Islands GOP caucus, based on results from the Republican Party of the Virgin Islands. trib.al/760IW1P

item.title: 创纪录的暖冬天气对每年这个时候通常覆盖五大湖的冰层造成了严重影响。
item.description: Record warm winter weather is having severe ramifications on the ice cover that typically engulfs the Great Lakes at this time of year. trib.al/1Zs363k
